column6:
"Bosom Buddies" ,2005,11
The Black Box has access to all of the world's telecommunications, and knowledge is power! But you know what else is power? Big smacking guns that never seem to draw blood but make all kinds of crackly energy come out of them! Now THAT's power! And you know who has LOTS of those guns...? Cable, of course! (Where were you in the '90s?) Part 3 (of 4).
32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Udon Comics | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Patrick Zircher
